x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: This fix script is to revert back to old native mobile "Content Task" cards and old Mobile Content Section from the new cards and record section shipped as part of Utah next experience. This script is only for the customers who have upgraded to Utah and want to go back to old mobile views.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Mobile Revert Next Exp - Cont Pub

x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.sys_name: Mobile Revert Next Exp - Cont Pub
